events.message: I placed an order two weeks ago, but it still hasn't arrived, and the tracking hasn't updated for several days.
The customer's issue has been categorized as a Delivery Delay based on the mention of late shipment and tracking issues.
Assigned the case to delivery support team to investigate the delayed shipment and provide updates to the customer.

We found that your package was delayed due to a logistics issue. It is now in transit and should be delivered within the next 2 business days.
Thank you for the update. I appreciate you checking on the status and letting me know when I can expect it.
We consider this issue resolved as the shipment is back on track and expected to arrive shortly.
Just checking in to confirm that your order arrived safely and that you are satisfied with the resolution of the delivery delay.
Closing the case as the delivery delay has been resolved and the customer confirmed satisfaction with the solution.
Sent a customer satisfaction survey to gather feedback about the handling of the delivery delay case.
